Premium air travel for your business, le: Premium air travel for your business, leisure and charter needs.
support_message: Whether you're booking a flight or chartering a helicopter, we're here to help. Search our FAQs or contact our support team.
premium_air_travel: Premium air travel for your business, leisure and charter needs.
subscribe_description: Get travel deals and updates straight to your inbox.
travel_info_subtitle: Everything you need to know before your flight
baggage_policy_content: Passengers are allowed one carry-on and one personal item. Checked baggage must not exceed 23kg. Oversize or overweight bags may incur additional fees.
checkin_guidelines_content: Online check-in opens 24 hours before departure. Arrive 2 hours early for domestic and 3 hours for international flights.
travel_restrictions_content: Entry requirements vary. Check destination visa and documentation requirements in advance.
id_and_docs_content: A government-issued photo ID is required. For international travel, a valid passport and any necessary visas are mandatory.
weather_and_delays_content: You will be notified via SMS or email if your flight is delayed due to weather or operational issues.
security_procedures_content: Remove laptops, liquids, and metal items at the security checkpoint. Limit liquids to 100ml per container.
children_and_minors_content: Unaccompanied minors require prior arrangement. Please contact support for details.
special_assistance_content: If you need wheelchair access or other special assistance, please notify us at least 48 hours before your flight.
need_help_content: Our support team is here for you 24/7
customer_support_content: Need assistance? We’re here to help. Choose from the options below or contact us directly.
faq_description: Find quick answers to common questions.
live_chat_description: Chat with our support team in real-time.
contact_us_directly_text: Send us a message and our team will get back to you shortly.
faq_header_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about flights and helicopter charters.
faq_browse_description: Browse common questions about flight bookings and helicopter charters.
faq_a_trogon: Trogon Airways is Haiti's premier domestic airline, offering safe and comfortable flights between Port-au-Prince (PAP), Les Cayes (CYA), and Cap-Haïtien (CAP).
faq_a_name: We're named after the Hispaniolan Trogon (Priotelus roseigaster), Haiti's national bird that symbolizes our country's natural beauty and resilience. Just like this rare bird, we aim to provide unique and exceptional service.
faq_q_routes: What routes do you currently fly?
faq_a_routes:
We operate regular flights between:
- Port-au-Prince ↔ Les Cayes
- Port-au-Prince ↔ Cap-Haïtien
faq_q_plan: Do you plan to add more destinations?
faq_a_plan: Yes! We're constantly evaluating new routes to better serve Haiti. Check our website for future route announcements.
faq_q_book_flight: How can I book a flight?
faq_a_book_flight:
You can book through:
- Our official website
- Airport ticket counters
- Authorized travel agents
- Customer service hotline
faq_q_payment: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_a_payment:
We accept:
- Credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard)
- Mobile payment (Kashpaw)
- Cash at airport offices
faq_a_baggage:
Our standard policy:
- Economy: 1 checked bag (23kg) + 1 carry-on (7kg)
- Business: 2 checked bags (32kg total) + 1 carry-on
faq_a_items: Standard aviation security restrictions apply. No weapons, flammable materials, or hazardous items.
faq_a_early:
We recommend:
- 90 minutes before departure for domestic flights
- Earlier during peak travel periods
faq_a_documents: Valid government-issued photo ID (passport, national ID card, or driver's license)
faq_a_change_flight: Yes, changes are permitted with applicable fees based on fare type.
faq_a_refunds: Refund eligibility depends on fare conditions. Contact our customer service for assistance.
faq_q_accommodate: Do you accommodate passengers with disabilities?
faq_a_accommodate: Absolutely. Please notify us at least 48 hours before travel for special assistance.
faq_a_travel: Small pets in carriers may be permitted in cabin with prior approval. Service animals are always welcome.
faq_q_safety: What safety measures do you have?
faq_a_safety: We adhere to all international aviation safety standards with modern aircraft and highly trained crew.
faq_q_contact_support: How can I reach customer service?
faq_a_contact_support:
Contact us via:
- Phone: +509 3341 0404
- Email: contact@trogonairways.com
- Social media: Facebook, Instagram
- Airport offices at all served locations
faq_q_charter_helicopter: How do I charter a helicopter?
faq_a_charter_helicopter: Use our helicopter booking tool or contact our charter specialists.
faq_q_baggage_helicopter: What is the baggage allowance for helicopter charters?
faq_a_baggage_helicopter: Helicopters have strict limits. Contact support for details.
faq_q_pets_helicopter: Are pets allowed on helicopter charters?
faq_a_pets_helicopter: Some charters allow pets. Please notify us during booking.
faq_q_seat_selection: Can I choose my seat during flight booking?
faq_a_seat_selection: Yes, seat selection is available at checkout and in your account.
faq_q_need_account: Do I need an account to book a flight or helicopter?
faq_a_need_account: You can book as a guest, but an account helps manage bookings.
terms_header_subtitle: Please read carefully before using our services.
title: ✈️ TROGON AIRWAYS – TERMS OF SERVICE
address: Address: Immeuble Le Belvédère, 4ᵉ floor, Angles Clerveau & Chavannes, Pétion‑Ville, Haiti
1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
1.text: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of all services provided by Trogon Airways S.A. (“Trogon Airways”, “we”, “us”, “our”). By purchasing a ticket, using our website or mobile applications, or boarding a flight, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms.
2.title: 2. Reservations and Payment
2.1: Flight reservations are subject to availability and are only confirmed upon full payment.
2.2: Passengers are responsible for providing accurate and complete information.
2.3: We accept the following payment methods:
2.3.list: Mobile money platforms: Moncash, Natcash, KashPaw
2.4: Tickets are issued electronically upon successful payment. Trogon Airways is not liable for issues arising from incorrect information submitted by the passenger.
3.title: 3. Check‑In and Boarding
3.1: Domestic Flights: Passengers must check in at least 90 minutes before departure.
3.2: International Flights: Check‑in closes 2 hours prior to scheduled departure.
3.3: Valid identification is required. Passports and visas are required for international travel.
3.4: Failure to check in on time or provide appropriate documentation may result in denied boarding without refund.
4.title: 4. Flight Changes, Delays, and Cancellations
4.1: Trogon Airways may cancel, delay, or reschedule flights due to safety, operational, technical, weather, legal, or force majeure circumstances.
4.2: In such cases, passengers may be rebooked on the next available flight or offered a refund, at the airline’s sole discretion and in accordance with applicable fare rules.
4.3: Passenger‑initiated changes are subject to ticket conditions, fees, and availability.
5.title: 5. Refund Policy
5.1: Refunds are governed by the fare class and ticket conditions selected during purchase.
5.2: Non‑refundable tickets are not eligible for reimbursement unless otherwise required by law.
5.3: Approved refunds will be issued to the original form of payment within 14 business days.
6.title: 6. Baggage Policy
6.1.title: 6.1 Carry‑On Baggage
6.1.text: Maximum Weight: 7 kg (15 lbs); Maximum Dimensions: 55 cm × 40 cm × 20 cm; Liquids must comply with aviation security rules: max 100 ml per container in a clear resealable plastic bag.
6.2.title: 6.2 Checked Baggage
6.2.text: Domestic Flights: 20 kg (44 lbs) included; International Flights: 23 kg (50 lbs) included; Additional fees apply for overweight or excess baggage.
6.3.title: 6.3 Restricted Items
6.3.list: Explosives, flammable substances, toxic materials, compressed gases, and corrosives
Firearms or replicas without proper declaration and documentation
7.title: 7. Passenger Conduct
7.1: Passengers must comply with safety regulations and instructions from crew members.
7.2: Disruptive, aggressive, intoxicated, or unlawful behavior may result in denied boarding, removal from the aircraft, or a ban from future travel.
7.3: Trogon Airways reserves the right to seek compensation for damages or costs resulting from a passenger’s misconduct.
8.title: 8. Liability and International Conventions
8.1: Trogon Airways’ liability for delays, baggage, injury, or death is limited to the extent permitted under applicable laws and treaties, including the Montreal Convention.
8.2: We are not responsible for delays or failures due to circumstances beyond our control (force majeure), including weather, security, or government actions.
8.3: No liability shall be accepted for loss of valuables unless declared and insured appropriately.
9.title: 9. Intellectual Property
9.text: All logos, content, trademarks, and branding appearing on Trogon Airways’ digital platforms are the exclusive property of Trogon Airways or its licensors. Unauthorized use is strictly prohibited.
10.title: 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
10.text: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Haiti. All disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts in Port‑au‑Prince, Haiti.
11.title: 11. Changes to Terms
11.text: We may revise these Terms at any time. Updates will be published on our website. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
12.title: 12. Contact
12.text: Trogon Airways S.A. Immeuble Le Belvédère, 4ᵉ floor, Angles Clerveau & Chavannes, Pétion‑Ville, Haiti. Email: info@trogonairways.com
privacy_header_subtitle: Learn how we handle your data securely.
privacy_intro: Trogon Airways is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal data.
privacy.1.title: 1. Data Controller
privacy.1.text: Trogon Airways S.A., Immeuble Le Belvédère, Pétion‑Ville, Haiti
privacy.2.title: 2. Data We Collect
privacy.2.list: Identity data (name, date of birth, passport or ID number)
Contact details (email, phone number, mailing address)
Technical data (IP address, cookies, device information)
privacy.3.title: 3. Purpose of Collection
privacy.3.list: Comply with legal and security requirements
privacy.4.title: 4. Legal Grounds for Processing
privacy.5.title: 5. Who We Share Data With
privacy.5.list: IT, analytics, and marketing providers (with consent)
privacy.6.title: 6. International Transfers
privacy.6.text: If personal data is transferred outside Haiti, we implement adequate safeguards in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
privacy.7.title: 7. Data Retention
privacy.7.text: We retain personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill contractual, legal, and operational obligations.
privacy.8.title: 8. Your Rights
privacy.8.list: Access to or correction of your data
privacy.9.title: 9. Security
privacy.9.text: We implement physical, digital, and procedural safeguards to protect your information from unauthorized access or misuse.
privacy.10.title: 10. Updates
privacy.10.text: We may update this policy periodically. The most current version will always be available on our website with its effective date.
cookie_header_subtitle: Understand how we use cookies to enhance your experience.
cookie_intro: This policy explains how Trogon Airways uses cookies on our website and digital services.
cookie.1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
cookie.1.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help us remember your preferences, improve your user experience, and analyze traffic.
cookie.2.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
cookie.2.list: Strictly Necessary Cookies: Enable core website functions
Performance Cookies: Track usage to improve service quality
Functionality Cookies: Store preferences like language and region
Marketing Cookies: Deliver relevant ads (with your consent)
cookie.3.title: 3. Managing Cookies
cookie.3.text: You can accept or reject cookies using the following methods. Please note that disabling cookies may impact website functionality.
cookie.4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
cookie.4.text: We use trusted analytics and advertising tools such as Google Analytics and Meta Pixel. These third parties may also place cookies under their own policies.
cookie.5.title: 5. Cookie Duration
cookie.5.text: Cookies may be session-based or persistent, lasting up to 24 months depending on their type and function.
charter_header_subtitle: With our charter flights, travel freely, without detour, into the light of your own path.
